title: The Rickshaw Accident
initial_event: A rickshaw has hit a car. Both drivers claim the other is at fault. Traffic is building up behind them.
context: This is a busy road near the airport. Traffic police are notoriously corrupt in this area. Both parties want to resolve this quickly but have conflicting interests.
scene_description: Two vehicles are stopped in the middle of a busy road. A rickshaw with a dented front, and a sedan with a scratched bumper. Horns are honking. People are gathering.
